patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index 24fdcd6..7dad619 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -36,7 +36,7 @@
     "lodash": "^4.17.21",
     "node-forge": "^1.3.1",
     "node-notifier": "^10.0.1",
-    "os-locale": "^5.0.0",
+    "os-locale": "^6.0.2",
     "rimraf": "^4.1.1",
     "semver": "^7.3.8",
     "unzipper": "0.10.11",
diff --git a/src/hooks/analytics/segment-adapter.ts b/src/hooks/analytics/segment-adapter.ts
index f8512b0..b08be5b 100644
--- a/src/hooks/analytics/segment-adapter.ts
+++ b/src/hooks/analytics/segment-adapter.ts
@@ -119,7 +119,7 @@ export class SegmentAdapter {
       os_name: os.platform(),
       os_version: os.release(),
       os_distribution: this.getDistribution(),
-      locale: osLocale.sync().replace('_', '-'),
+      osLocale: osLocale.osLocaleSync().replace('_','-'),
     }
   }
 
@@ -130,7 +130,7 @@ export class SegmentAdapter {
   private async getSegmentEventContext(): Promise<any> {
     return {
       ip: '0.0.0.0',
-      locale: osLocale.sync().replace('_', '-'),
+      locale: osLocale.osLocaleSync().replace('_', '-'),
       app: {
         name: getProjectName(),
       },
